text: Apple Inc. opened a new office in Dublin.
JP Morgan met investors in New York.
Google announced a partnership with the University of Oxford.
Tesla is building a new factory in Berlin.
The headquarters of UNESCO are located in Paris.
Amazon expanded its logistics network across Brazil.
The European Central Bank held a meeting in Frankfurt.
IBM opened a research center near Lake Tahoe.
Meta Platforms is investing in AI hubs in Singapore.
The United Nations hosted a summit in Geneva.
